short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pin and organize your ChatGPT conversations into folders for a clutter-free experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PinFold helps you effortlessly organize and manage your ChatGPT conversations, ensuring you never lose track of important chats. With PinFold, you can pin essential chats for instant access and categorize them into organized folders, creating a seamless, clutter-free experience that enhances your productivity.

𝐏𝐫𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠
🆓 The FREE version allows you to pin up to 1 chat and create 1 folder. A small one-time payment to unlock unlimited pins and folders.

𝐖𝐡𝐲 𝐂𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐬𝐞 𝐏𝐢𝐧𝐅𝐨𝐥𝐝?
1️⃣ Pin and Folder Management: Pin key chats and group them into folders for easy navigation. 
2️⃣ Productivity Boost: No more searching for important conversations; quickly find and access them when needed. 🔍
3️⃣ User-Friendly Interface: Designed for simplicity and efficiency, helping you focus on your work, not the search.

𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬
◻️Organize ChatGPT chats into customizable folders.
◻️ Pin chats for quick retrieval.
◻️ Easy-to-use interface that integrates seamlessly with your existing ChatGPT experience.
◻️ Dark & light mode support for comfortable use in any environment. 🌚🌞
◻️ All data is stored securely on your local machine—privacy-focused. 🕶️
◻️ Sync your folders across multiple devices for seamless access. 🔄

More Coming Soon! Stay tuned for future updates with more advanced chat management and integration features.
